business_strategies.strategy: Find your unfair advantage through 4-stage self-audit: business access, experience, connections, and interest

business_strategies.expected_results: Higher deal sizes, better retainer structures, clearer positioning

startup_ideas.idea: Specialized AI automation agency for specific industries with personal connection

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Choosing a niche without considering your unfair advantage
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Competing in oversaturated markets, struggling to differentiate, lower success rates
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Complete the 4-stage self-audit before selecting niche
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Joining the back of the queue instead of leveraging unique positioning

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Going too general with AI automation services
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Unclear positioning, difficulty with pricing, competing with everyone
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Combine industry focus with specific solution types
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Saying 'I do AI automation' vs 'I make AI voice agents for chiropractors'
